document_data.name: Ardul
document_data.mainbody: '''Ardul''' was a guardsman who served in the [[Marsember Watch]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He began serving in the Watch at quite a young age.
document_data.Relationships: Ardul's moral compass was regularly tested by his superior in the Watch, Topsword [[Kleef Kenric]].
document_data.History:
On [[Uktar 2]] of the {{YearlinkName|1486}}, when the city of Marsember was being evacuated in response to the invasion of the [[Shadovar]], Ardul and his fellow watchmen were tasked with clearing out [[Wilhastle Square]].

Later on, when Grand Duchess [[Elira Seasilver]] was abducted by [[Yder Tanthul]] aboard the ''[[Wave Wyvern]]'', Ardul was among those brave [[Cormyr]]ians to board the ''[[Lonely Roamer]]'' with Topsword Kenric to ensure her safety.
